title: The Legend of Ol Red Eyes
description: The last place Pepper Jones wanted to be on Halloween night was a graveyard. Not wanting to let her friends down however, she agreed to go with them to investigate the old legend.The Legend of Ol Red Eyes!Everybody was all smiles when they entered the old cemeteryâ€¦little knowing the horror that awaited them just up the hill.Ol Red Eyes is the scariest legend to come around since the Headless Horseman. Check out this haunted tale, and then enjoy some fun Halloween recipes!
author: J.T. Lewis
